scripts.deploy:testnet: yarn graph deploy sbvhev/prediction_dehub_test --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token $(dotenv -p SUBGRAPH_TOKEN_TESTNET)
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn graph deploy dehubtoken/dehub-prediction --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token $(dotenv -p SUBGRAPH_TOKEN_MAINNET)
